episodes.title: The Beauty, Horror & Drama of Japanese Cults
episodes.description:
Japan is home to so many cults or new religious movements, it's impossible not to encounter them if you live here. Magnus shares his experiences with Japanese cults and how digging just a little deeper revealed interlocking narratives so funny, bizarre and horrifying that it had to be shared.

Go follow Mizna:
@imymeify 


Some sources may be missing so please contact me if you need more info.
